articles.author: Aaron Kliegman
articles.title: North Carolina lawmaker officially leaves Dems for GOP, says turning point was American flag criticism - Fox News
articles.description: A lawmaker in North Carolina announced she's leaving the Democratic Party and becoming a Republican, giving the GOP a veto-proof majority in the state legislature.
articles.content:
A lawmaker in North Carolina announced Wednesday that she's leaving the Democratic Party and becoming a Republican, giving the GOP a veto-proof majority in the state legislature.
